name: Spellcards
description:
Spellcards created for the KO!! Slam-Jam

Description:
Dear Wizard,

the Meownster is rapidly approaching the city! All your training has come down to this moment. Create spell cards to destroy this horrid creature.

Combine ingredient cards to create material and spell cards. Be careful as wrong combinations will failed! Once a successful spell has been created place it into the Tomb!

You are our only hope!
-Q. Snailey

CONTROLS:

  • Left mouse pick up/ drop cards
  • Right mouse drop last card while holding a stack
  • Drop cards on top of each other to start crafting
  • You will get a Failed Creation card if their is no recipe for the cards you stacked
  • Put spells in the Tomb on the table to start casting them
  • Move mouse to the top of the screen to see outside the window (and back down to look back down)
  • Sell cards by dragging them into the 'Sell Area'
  • Buy cards by clicking, or dragging on the card packs
